name: Terminal Agony
text:
Destroy target creature.
Madness {B}{R} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor: His mouth melted to slag, yet somehow he kept screaming.

rulings.text: Cards are discarded in a Magic game only from a player's hand. Effects that put cards into a player's graveyard from anywhere else do not cause those cards to be discarded.

Madness works independently of why you're discarding the card. You could discard it to pay a cost, because a spell or ability tells you to, or because you have too many cards in your hand during your cleanup step. You can't discard a card with madness just because you want to, though.

A card with madness that's discarded counts as having been discarded even though it's put into exile rather than a graveyard. If it was discarded to pay a cost, that cost is still paid. Abilities that trigger when a card is discarded will still trigger.

A spell cast for its madness cost is put onto the stack like any other spell. It can be countered, copied, and so on. As it resolves, it's put onto the battlefield if it's a permanent card or into its owner's graveyard if it's an instant or sorcery card.
Casting a spell with madness ignores the timing rules based on the card's card type. For example, you can cast a sorcery with madness if you discard it during an opponent's turn.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost (such as a madness cost) you're paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell is determined by only its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast that spell was.
If you choose not to cast a card with madness when the madness triggered ability resolves, it's put into your graveyard. Madness doesn't give you another chance to cast it later.

If you discard a card with madness to pay the cost of a spell or activated ability, that card's madness triggered ability (and the spell that card becomes, if you choose to cast it) will resolve before the spell or ability the discard paid for.

If you discard a card with madness while a spell or ability is resolving, it moves immediately to exile. Continue resolving that spell or ability, noting that the card you discarded is not in your graveyard at this time. Its madness triggered ability will be placed onto the stack once that spell or ability has completely resolved.

Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.

foreignNames.flavor: Sein Mund schmolz zu Schlacke, doch irgendwie schrie er immer weiter.

foreignNames.text:
Destruye la criatura objetivo.
Demencia {B}{R}. (Si descartas esta carta, exíliala. Cuando lo hagas, lánzala por su coste de demencia o ponla en tu cementerio.)

foreignNames.name: Angoisse terminale
foreignNames.text:
Détruisez une créature ciblée.
Folie {B}{R} (Si vous vous défaussez de cette carte, défaussez-vous-en vers l'exil. Quand vous faites ainsi, lancez-la pour son coût de folie ou mettez-la dans votre cimetière.)

foreignNames.name: Atroce Agonia

Follia {B}{R} (Se scarti questa carta, scartala in esilio. Quando lo fai, lanciala pagando il suo costo di follia o mettila nel tuo cimitero.)

マッドネス{B}{R}（あなたがこのカードを捨てるなら、これを追放領域に捨てる。そうしたとき、マッドネス・コストでこれを唱えるか、これをあなたの墓地に置く。）

foreignNames.name: 치유할 수 없는 고통

광기 {B}{R} (이 카드를 버리는 경우, 추방 영역에 버린다. 그렇게 할 때, 광기 비용을 지불하고 이 카드를 발동하거나 당신의 무덤에 이 카드를 놓는다.)

foreignNames.name: Agonia Terminal

Уничтожьте целевое существо.
Бешенство {B}{R} (Если вы сбрасываете эту карту, сбросьте ее в изгнание. Когда вы это делаете, разыграйте ее за ее стоимость Бешенства или положите на ваше кладбище.)
foreignNames.flavor: Его рот расплавился и растекся шлаком, но каким-то образом он продолжал кричать.

foreignNames.flavor: 虽然嘴已遭熔毁，但他仍在狂啸。

foreignNames.name: 終極苦痛

瘋魔{B}{R}（如果你棄掉此牌，將之棄到放逐區。當你如此作時，支付其瘋魔費用施放之，否則便將其置入你的墳墓場。）
foreignNames.flavor: 雖然嘴已遭熔毀，但他仍在狂嘯。

name: Territorial Kavu
text:
Domain — Territorial Kavu's power and toughness are each equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.
Whenever Territorial Kavu attacks, choose one —
• Discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
• Exile up to one target card from a graveyard.

rulings.text: Domain abilities count the number of basic land types among lands you control, not how many lands you control or how many of any type.
The basic land types are Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest. Land types other than basic land types (such as Desert) don't contribute to domain abilities.

foreignNames.name: Gebietstreuer Kavu
foreignNames.text:
Domäne — Stärke und Widerstandskraft des Gebietstreuen Kavu sind gleich der Anzahl an Standardlandtypen unter den Ländern, die du kontrollierst.
Immer wenn der Gebietstreue Kavu angreift, bestimme eines —
• Wirf eine Karte ab. Falls du dies tust, ziehe eine Karte.
• Schicke bis zu eine Karte deiner Wahl aus einem Friedhof ins Exil.

foreignNames.name: Kavu territorial
foreignNames.text:
Dominio — Tanto la fuerza como la resistencia del Kavu territorial son iguales a la cantidad de tipos de tierra básica entre las tierras que controlas.
Siempre que el Kavu territorial ataque, elige uno:
• Descarta una carta. Si lo haces, roba una carta.
• Exilia hasta una carta objetivo de un cementerio.

foreignNames.name: Kavru territorial
foreignNames.text:
Domaine — La force et l'endurance du Kavru territorial sont chacune égales au nombre de types de terrain de base parmi les terrains que vous contrôlez.
À chaque fois que le Kavru territorial attaque, choisissez l'un —
• Défaussez-vous d'une carte. Si vous faites ainsi, piochez une carte.
• Exilez jusqu'à une carte ciblée depuis un cimetière.

foreignNames.name: Kavu Territoriale
foreignNames.text:
Dominio — La forza e la costituzione del Kavu Territoriale sono pari al numero di tipi di terra base tra le terre che controlli.
Ogniqualvolta il Kavu Territoriale attacca, scegli uno —
• Scarta una carta. Se lo fai, pesca una carta.
• Esilia fino a una carta bersaglio da un cimitero.

foreignNames.name: 縄張り持ちのカヴー
foreignNames.text:
版図 ― 縄張り持ちのカヴーのパワーとタフネスは、それぞれあなたがコントロールしている土地の中の基本土地タイプの種類数に等しい。
縄張り持ちのカヴーが攻撃するたび、以下から１つを選ぶ。
• カード１枚を捨てる。そうしたなら、カード１枚を引く。
• 墓地からカード最大１枚を対象とする。それを追放する。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — カヴー

foreignNames.name: 영역을 지키는 카부
foreignNames.text:
영토 — 영역을 지키는 카부의 공격력과 방어력은 각각 당신이 조종하는 대지들이 가진 기본 대지 유형의 수와 같다.
영역을 지키는 카부가 공격할 때마다, 하나를 선택한다 —
• 카드 한 장을 버린다. 그렇게 한다면, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
• 무덤에 있는 카드를 최대 한 개까지 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 추방한다.

foreignNames.name: Kavu Territorial
foreignNames.text:
Dominar — O poder e a resistência de Kavu Territorial são ambos iguais ao número de tipos de terreno básico entre os terrenos que você controla.
Toda vez que Kavu Territorial atacar, escolha um —
• Descarte um card. Se fizer isso, compre um card.
• Exile até um card alvo de um cemitério.

foreignNames.name: Территориальный Каву
foreignNames.text:
Владения — Сила и выносливость Территориального Каву равны количеству типов базовых земель среди земель под вашим контролем.
Каждый раз, когда Территориальный Каву атакует, выберите одно —
• Сбросьте карту. Если вы это делаете, возьмите карту.
• Изгоните не более одной целевой карты из кладбища.

foreignNames.name: 据地卡甫
foreignNames.text:
领土～据地卡甫的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的地中基本地类别之数量。
每当据地卡甫攻击时，选择一项～
•弃一张牌。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。
•将至多一张目标牌从坟墓场放逐。

foreignNames.name: 據地卡甫
foreignNames.text:
領土～據地卡甫的力量和防禦力各等同於由你操控的地中基本地類別之數量。
每當據地卡甫攻擊時，選擇一項～
•棄一張牌。若你如此作，則抽一張牌。
•將至多一張目標牌從墳墓場放逐。

originalText:
Domain — Territorial Kavu's power and toughness are each equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.
Whenever Territorial Kavu attacks, choose one —
• Discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
• Exile up to one target card from a graveyard.

name: Wavesifter
text:
Flying
When Wavesifter enters the battlefield, investigate twice. (To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Evoke {G}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

rulings.text: The token is named Clue and has the artifact subtype Clue. Clue isn't a creature type.
The tokens are normal artifacts. For example, one can be sacrificed to activate the ability of Breya's Apprentice and one can be the target of Break Ties.
You can't sacrifice a Clue to activate its own ability and also to activate another ability that requires sacrificing a Clue (or any artifact) as a cost, such as that of Lonis, Cryptozoologist.

foreignNames.name: Wellenstöberer
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Wellenstöberer ins Spiel kommt, stelle zweimal Nachforschungen an. (Um Nachforschungen anzustellen, erzeuge einen farblosen Hinweis-Artefaktspielstein mit „{2}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Ziehe eine Karte.")
Herbeirufen {G}{U} (Du kannst diesen Zauberspruch für seine Herbeirufungskosten wirken. Falls du dies tust, wird die Kreatur geopfert, wenn sie ins Spiel kommt.)

foreignNames.name: Errante oceanobundo
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Cuando el Errante oceanobundo entre al campo de batalla, investiga dos veces. (Para investigar, crea una ficha de artefacto Pista incolora con "{2}, sacrificar este artefacto: Roba una carta".)
Evocar {G}{U}. (Puedes lanzar este hechizo por su coste de evocar. Si lo haces, sacrifícalo cuando entre al campo de batalla.)

foreignNames.name: Tamiseur de vagues
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Quand le Tamiseur de vagues arrive sur le champ de bataille, enquêtez deux fois. (Pour enquêter, créez un jeton d'artefact incolore Indice avec « {2}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Piochez une carte. »)
Évocation {G}{U} (Vous pouvez lancer ce sort pour son coût d'évocation. Si vous faites ainsi, il est sacrifié quand il arrive sur le champ de bataille.)

foreignNames.name: Setacciaonde
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Quando il Setacciaonde entra nel campo di battaglia, indaga due volte. (Per indagare, crea una pedina artefatto Indizio incolore con "{2}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Pesca una carta".)
Apparire {G}{U} (Puoi lanciare questa magia pagando il suo costo di apparire. Se lo fai, viene sacrificata quando entra nel campo di battaglia.)

foreignNames.name: 波ふるい
foreignNames.text:
飛行
波ふるいが戦場に出たとき、２回調査を行う。（調査を行うとは、「{2}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：カード１枚を引く。」を持つ無色の手掛かり・アーティファクト・トークン１つを生成することである。）
想起{G}{U}（あなたはこの呪文を想起コストで唱えてもよい。そうしたなら、これが戦場に出たとき、これを生け贄に捧げる。）
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル

foreignNames.name: 파도조사자

name: Academy Manufactor
text: If you would create a Clue, Food, or Treasure token, instead create one of each.
flavor: Automated systems at the Tolarian Academy sort new acquisitions for optimal use, determining which should be studied, eaten, or sold.

rulings.text: If you control one Academy Manufactor and would create some number of Clue, Food, or Treasure tokens, you will instead create that many Clue tokens, that many Food tokens, and that many Treasure tokens.

If you control two Academy Manufactors and would create some number of Clue, Food, or Treasure tokens, you will instead create three times that many Clue tokens, three times that many Food tokens, and three times that many Treasure tokens.

If you control eighteen Academy Manufactors (I don't know, you figure it out) and would create some number of Clue, Food, or Treasure tokens, you will instead create 129,140,163 times that many Clue tokens, 129,140,163 times that many Food tokens, and 129,140,163 times that many Treasure tokens.

Creating a Clue token this way isn't the same thing as investigating. Notably, an ability that triggers whenever you investigate won't trigger because you created a Clue token due to this replacement effect. If the original token creation was because you investigated once, those abilities will still each trigger once, no matter how many Clue tokens you end up creating.

name: Altar of the Goyf
text:
Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of card types among cards in all graveyards.
Lhurgoyf creatures you control have trample.
flavor:
"What dies grows the [illegible]"
—Clawed-out statue inscription

rulings.text: Tribal is a card type that allows noncreature cards to have creature types. Altar of the Goyf is a Lhurgoyf (although not a creature) while on the battlefield, and a Lhurgoyf card (although not a creature card) in zones other than the battlefield.

A creature attacks alone if it's the only creature declared as an attacker during the declare attackers step (including creatures controlled by your teammates, if applicable). For example, Altar of the Goyf's first ability won't trigger if you attack with multiple creatures and all but one of them are removed from combat.

The card types that can appear in a graveyard are artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, land, planeswalker, sorcery, and tribal. Legendary, basic, and snow are supertypes, not card types; Aura and Lhurgoyf are subtypes, not card types.
If Altar of the Goyf somehow becomes a creature and the effect allows to keep its other types, it will give itself trample.

originalText: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Brainstone: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

name: Dermotaxi
text:
Imprint — As Dermotaxi enters the battlefield, exile a creature card from a graveyard.
Tap two untapped creatures you control: Until end of turn, Dermotaxi becomes a copy of the exiled card, except it's a Vehicle artifact in addition to its other types.

rulings.text: The choice of what card is exiled is a replacement effect, not a triggered ability. Players can't respond to the card being exiled.

The imprint ability is linked to the activated ability that makes Dermotaxi a creature. This means that the second ability refers only to the card exiled by the first, even if it becomes a copy of something that later exiles other cards.

If you activate the ability, but there's no exiled card to reference (perhaps because there wasn't one in any graveyard to imprint), the ability does nothing. Dermotaxi won't become a copy of anything.

Dermotaxi does not have a crew ability. Activating the ability to have it become a copy of the exiled card doesn't count as crewing a Vehicle. If a creature you tap to activate the ability has a triggered ability that triggers whenever it crews a Vehicle (such as that of Gearshift Ace), that ability won't trigger.

name: Diamond Lion
text: {T}, Discard your hand, Sacrifice Diamond Lion: Add three mana of any one color. Activate only as an instant.
flavor:
"The merchant asked for riches no one had ever dreamed of. The djinn, smiling, granted his wish."
—Afari, *Tales*

rulings.text: Even though you can only activate this as an instant, it is still a mana ability. It doesn't use the stack and cannot be responded to.

You can't cast an instant (or activate an ability as an instant) while casting a spell. Therefore, much like Lion's Eye Diamond, you can't activate the ability intending to use the mana to cast a spell from your hand.

name: Nettlecyst

rulings.text: The living weapon ability has been updated so that the triggered ability creates Phyrexian Germ tokens rather than Germ tokens. This update applies to all cards with living weapon.
If a permanent you control is both an artifact and an enchantment, count it only once when determining the bonus from an equipped Nettlecyst.

The Phyrexian Germ token enters the battlefield as a 0/0 creature and the Equipment becomes attached to it before state-based actions would cause the token to die. Abilities that trigger as the token enters the battlefield see that a 0/0 creature entered the battlefield.

Like other Equipment, each Equipment with living weapon has an equip cost. You can pay this cost to attach an Equipment to another creature you control. Once the Phyrexian Germ token is no longer equipped, it will be put into your graveyard and subsequently cease to exist, unless another effect raises its toughness above 0.
If the Phyrexian Germ token is destroyed, the Equipment remains on the battlefield as with any other Equipment.

If the living weapon trigger causes two Phyrexian Germs to be created (due to an effect such as that of Doubling Season), the Equipment becomes attached to one of them. The other will be put into your graveyard and subsequently cease to exist, unless another effect raises its toughness above 0.

rulings.text: Unlike the normal cycling ability, typecycling doesn't allow you to draw a card. Rather, it lets you search your library for a card with the type or types indicated by the ability name. For example, a card with basic landcycling lets you search for a basic land card, and a card with Wizardcycling lets you search for a Wizard card.

Typecycling is a form of cycling. Any ability that triggers on a card being cycled also triggers on a card being typecycled. Any ability that stops a cycling ability from being activated also stops a typecycling ability from being activated.

name: Sol Talisman
text:
Suspend 3—{1} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {1} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)
{T}: Add {C}{C}.

rulings.text: Suspend is a keyword that represents three abilities. The first is a static ability that allows you to exile the card from your hand with the specified number of time counters (the number before the dash) on it by paying its suspend cost (listed after the dash). The second is a triggered ability that removes a time counter from the suspended card at the beginning of each of your upkeeps. The third is a triggered ability that causes you to cast the card when the last time counter is removed. If you cast a creature spell this way, it gains haste until you lose control of that creature (or, in rare cases, you lose control of the creature spell while it's on the stack).

You can exile a card in your hand using suspend any time you could cast that card. Consider its card type, any effects that modify when you could cast it (such as flash) and any other effects that stop you from casting it (such as from Meddling Mage's ability) to determine if and when you can do this. Whether you could actually complete all steps in casting the card is irrelevant. For example, you can exile a card with suspend that has no mana cost or that requires a target even if no legal targets are available at that time.
Cards exiled with suspend are exiled face up.
Exiling a card with suspend isn't casting that card. This action doesn't use the stack and can't be responded to.
If the spell requires any targets, those targets are chosen when the spell is finally cast, not when it's exiled.
If an effect refers to a “suspended card,” that means a card that (1) has suspend, (2) is in exile, and (3) has one or more time counters on it.

If the first triggered ability of suspend (the one that removes time counters) is countered, no time counter is removed. The ability will trigger again at the beginning of the card's owner's next upkeep.

When the last time counter is removed, the second triggered ability of suspend (the one that lets you cast the card) triggers. It doesn't matter why the last time counter was removed or what effect removed it.
If the second triggered ability is countered, the card can't be cast. It remains exiled with no time counters on it, and it's no longer suspended.

As the second triggered ability resolves, you must cast the card if able. You must do so even if it requires targets and the only legal targets are ones that you really don't want to target. Timing permissions based on the card's type are ignored.
If you can't cast the card, perhaps because there are no legal targets available, it remains exiled with no time counters on it, and it's no longer suspended.

If you cast a card “without paying its mana cost,” such as with suspend, you can't choose to cast it for any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, you must pay those if you want to cast the card.

You are never forced to activate mana abilities to pay costs, so if there is a mandatory additional mana cost (such as from Thalia, Guardian of Thraben), you can decline to activate mana abilities to pay for it and hence fail to cast the suspended card, leaving it in exile.
If the card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.
The mana value of a spell cast without paying its mana cost is determined by its mana cost, even though that cost wasn't paid.
A card with no mana cost can't be cast normally; you'll need a way to cast it for an alternative cost or without paying its mana cost, such as by suspending it.
If a card with no mana cost is given an alternative cost equal to its mana cost (by Snapcaster Mage, for example), that cost cannot be paid and the card cannot be cast this way.

강철 단봉낙타는 +1/+1 카운터 두 개를 가지고 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
강철 단봉낙타는 자신에게 +1/+1 카운터가 놓여 있다면 당신의 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.
당신의 턴 전투 시작에, 생물을 목표로 정한다. 당신은 강철 단봉낙타에 있는 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 그 생물에게 옮길 수 있다.

foreignNames.name: Dromedário de Aço
foreignNames.text:
Dromedário de Aço entra no campo de batalha virado com dois marcadores +1/+1.
Dromedário de Aço não é desvirado durante sua etapa de desvirar se tiver um marcador +1/+1.
No início do combate no seu turno você pode mover um marcador +1/+1 de Dromedário de Aço para a criatura alvo.

foreignNames.name: Стальной Дромадер
foreignNames.text:
Стальной Дромадер выходит на поле битвы повернутым с двумя жетонами +1/+1 на нем.
Стальной Дромадер не разворачивается во время вашего шага разворота, если на нем есть жетон +1/+1.
В начале боя во время вашего хода вы можете переместить один жетон +1/+1 со Стального Дромадера на целевое существо.

foreignNames.name: 钢铁单峰驼
foreignNames.text:
钢铁单峰驼须横置进战场，且上面有两个+1/+1指示物。
如果钢铁单峰驼上有+1/+1指示物，则它于你的重置步骤中不能重置。
在你回合的战斗开始时，你可以将钢铁单峰驼上的一个+1/+1指示物移至目标生物上。

foreignNames.name: 鋼鐵單峰駝
foreignNames.text:
鋼鐵單峰駝須橫置進戰場，且上面有兩個+1/+1指示物。
如果鋼鐵單峰駝上有+1/+1指示物，則它於你的重置步驟中不能重置。
在你回合的戰鬥開始時，你可以將鋼鐵單峰駝上的一個+1/+1指示物移至目標生物上。

originalText:
Steel Dromedary enters the battlefield tapped with two +1/+1 counters on it.
Steel Dromedary doesn't untap during your untap step if it has a +1/+1 counter on it.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may move a +1/+1 counter from Steel Dromedary onto target creature.

name: Sword of Hearth and Home

rulings.text: As Sword of Hearth and Home's second ability resolves, the land and the creature will enter the battlefield at the same time.

If you choose a target creature you own and that creature isn't a legal target as the triggered ability tries to resolve, that ability won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won't search for a basic land card.
If the creature you own is a token, it won't return to the battlefield. It will stay in exile and cease to exist after the ability finishes resolving.

Espada de morada y hogar
foreignNames.text:
La criatura equipada obtiene +2/+2 y tiene protección contra verde y contra blanco.
Siempre que la criatura equipada haga daño de combate a un jugador, exilia hasta una criatura objetivo de la cual eres propietario y luego busca en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica. Pon ambas cartas en el campo de batalla bajo tu control y luego baraja.
Equipar {2}.

rulings.text: The Underworld Cookbook's last ability can target any creature card in your graveyard, not just one discarded with its first ability. name: Zabaz, the Glimmerwasp
text:
Modular 1
If a modular triggered ability would put one or more +1/+1 counters on a creature you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.
{R}: Destroy target artifact you control.
{W}: Zabaz, the Glimmerwasp gains flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: Zabaz the Glimmerwasp's replacement effect requires it to be on the battlefield to work. Notably, that means it won't increase the counters given by its own modular ability.

If this creature gets enough -1/-1 counters put on it to cause it to go to the graveyard, modular will put a number of +1/+1 counters on the target artifact creature equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature before it left the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: Zabaz die Glimmerwespe
foreignNames.text:
Bausteine 1
Falls durch eine ausgelöste Bausteine-Fähigkeit eine oder mehrere +1/+1-Marken auf eine Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, gelegt würden, werden stattdessen so viele plus eine +1/+1-Marken auf sie gelegt.
{R}: Zerstöre ein Artefakt deiner Wahl, das du kontrollierst.
{W}: Zabaz die Glimmerwespe erhält Flugfähigkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignNames.name: Zabaz, la Avispa Resplandeciente
foreignNames.text:
Modular 1.
Si una habilidad disparada de modular fuese a poner uno o más contadores +1/+1 sobre una criatura que controlas, en vez de eso, se pone esa misma cantidad más un contador +1/+1 sobre ella.
{R}: Destruye el artefacto objetivo que controlas.
{W}: Zabaz, la Avispa Resplandeciente gana la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno.

foreignNames.name: Zabaz, la guêpe rutilante

{R} : Détruisez un artefact ciblé que vous contrôlez.
{W} : Zabaz, la guêpe rutilante acquiert le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignNames.name: Zabaz, la Vespa Scintillante

{R}: Distruggi un artefatto bersaglio che controlli.
{W}: Zabaz, la Vespa Scintillante ha volare fino alla fine del turno.

foreignNames.name: 微光蜂、ザーバス
foreignNames.text:
接合１
接合の誘発型能力が、あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャーの上に１個以上の＋１/＋１カウンターを置くなら、代わりに、それの上にその個数に１を足した個数の＋１/＋１カウンターを置く。

name: Power Depot
text:
Power Depot enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
Modular 1

rulings.text: Power Depot is a land, so it can only be played as a land. It cannot be cast as a spell.

Yes, this land enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter, which does nothing while it's a land. When it's put into the graveyard from the battlefield, you may put its +1/+1 counters onto target artifact creature, no matter what Power Depot's card types are at the time.

If Power Depot is a creature and gets enough -1/-1 counters put on it to cause it to go to the graveyard, modular will put a number of +1/+1 counters on the target artifact creature equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature before it left the battlefield.
The mana produced by the last activated ability can't be spent to activate abilities of artifact cards in other zones, such as cycling or unearth costs.

name: Urza's Saga
text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Urza's Saga gains "{T}: Add {C}."
II — Urza's Saga gains "{2}, {T}: Create a 0/0 colorless Construct artifact creature token with 'This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control.'"
III — Search your library for an artifact card with mana cost {0} or {1}, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

rulings.text: Urza's Saga is a land, so it can only be played as a land. It cannot be cast as a spell.
Urza's Saga gains an ability from its first and second chapters. It keeps those abilities for as long as it's on the battlefield.

While resolving the chapter III ability, you can find only a card with actual mana cost {0} or {1}, not mana value 0 or 1. For example, you couldn't find a card with mana cost {U} or one with mana cost {X}.
Even though Urza's Saga is a land, it is also still a Saga, and it will be sacrificed after its last chapter ability resolves.
If Urza's Saga loses all of its chapter abilities but is still a Saga, perhaps due to a card like Blood Moon, it will immediately be sacrificed.
Although Urza's Saga has the Urza's land type, it doesn't interact with Urza's Tower, Urza's Mine, or Urza's Power Plant.

rulings.text: Yavimaya, Cradle of Growth isn't a Forest while it's not on the battlefield.
Land cards not on the battlefield aren't Forests while Yavimaya is on the battlefield.

Yavimaya's ability causes each land on the battlefield to have the land type Forest. Any land that's a Forest has the ability “{T}: Add {G}.” Nothing else changes about those lands, including their names, other subtypes, and whether they're legendary, basic, or snow.

foreignNames.name: 天国监护使
foreignNames.text: 飞行，反神器保护
foreignNames.flavor:
「切勿像对待器物般来对待你的子民。让他们离开，他们就能活下来；强留他们在此，他们终免不了一死。」
～克撒致蕾荻安

foreignNames.name: 天國監護使
foreignNames.text: 飛行，反神器保護
foreignNames.flavor:
「切勿像對待器物般來對待你的子民。讓他們離開，他們就能活下來；強留他們在此，他們終免不了一死。」
～克撒致蕾荻安

originalText: Flying, protection from artifacts

name: Karmic Guide
text:
Flying, protection from black
Echo {3}{W}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Karmic Guide enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

rulings.text: Paying for echo is always optional. When the echo triggered ability resolves, if you can't pay the echo cost or choose not to, you sacrifice that permanent.

Your permanent's echo ability will trigger at the beginning of your upkeep if it entered the battlefield since the beginning of your last upkeep, or if you gained control of it since the beginning of your last upkeep.

foreignNames.name: Karmischer Begleiter
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend, Schutz vor Schwarz
Echo {3}{W}{W} (Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments und falls diese bleibende Karte seit Beginn deines letzten Versorgungssegments unter deine Kontrolle gekommen ist, opfere sie, es sei denn, du bezahlst ihre Echokosten.)
Wenn der Karmische Begleiter ins Spiel kommt, bringe eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück.

foreignNames.name: Guía kármica
foreignNames.text:
Vuela, protección contra negro.
Eco {3}{W}{W}. (Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, si esto entró bajo tu control desde el comienzo de tu último mantenimiento, sacrifícalo a menos que pagues su coste de eco.)
Cuando la Guía kármica entre al campo de batalla, regresa la carta de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio al campo de batalla.

foreignNames.name: Guide karmique
foreignNames.text:
Vol, protection contre le noir
Écho {3}{W}{W} (Au début de votre entretien, si ce permanent est passé sous votre contrôle depuis le début de votre dernier entretien, sacrifiez-le à moins que vous ne payiez son coût d'écho.)
Quand le Guide karmique arrive sur le champ de bataille, renvoyez une carte de créature ciblée depuis votre cimetière sur le champ de bataille.

foreignNames.name: Guida del Karma
foreignNames.text:
Volare, protezione dal nero
Eco {3}{W}{W} (All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, se questo permanente è entrato sotto il tuo controllo dall'inizio del tuo ultimo mantenimento, sacrificalo a meno che non paghi il suo costo di eco.)
Quando la Guida del Karma entra nel campo di battaglia, rimetti sul campo di battaglia una carta creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.

foreignNames.name: 霊体の先達
foreignNames.text:
飛行、プロテクション（黒）
エコー{3}{W}{W}（あなたのアップキープの開始時に、これが直前のあなたのアップキープの開始時よりも後にあなたのコントロール下になっていた場合、これのエコー・コストを支払わないかぎりこれを生け贄に捧げる。）
霊体の先達が戦場に出たとき、あなたの墓地からクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とする。それを戦場に戻す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 天使・スピリット

foreignNames.name: 업보 안내인
foreignNames.text:
비행, 흑색으로부터 보호
에코 {3}{W}{W} (당신의 유지단 시작에, 이 생물이 당신의 지난 유지단 시작 이후로 당신의 조종하에 놓였다면, 당신이 이 생물의 에코 비용을 지불하지 않는 한 이 생물을 희생한다.)
업보 안내인이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 전장으로 되돌린다.

foreignNames.name: Guia Cármico
foreignNames.text:
Voar, proteção contra o preto
Eco {3}{W}{W} (No início de sua manutenção, se este card passou ao seu controle desde o início de sua última manutenção, sacrifique-o, a menos que você pague seu custo de eco.)
Quando Guia Cármico entrar no campo de batalha, devolva ao campo de batalha o card de criatura alvo de seu cemitério.

foreignNames.name: Кармическая Проводница
foreignNames.text:
Полет, Защита от черного
Эхо {3}{W}{W} (В начале вашего шага поддержки, если этот объект попал под ваш контроль с момента начала вашего предыдущего шага поддержки, пожертвуйте его, если вы не заплатите его стоимость Эха.)
Когда Кармическая Проводница выходит на поле битвы, верните целевую карту существа из вашего кладбища на поле битвы.

foreignNames.name: 宿命导士
foreignNames.text:
飞行，反黑保护
返响{3}{W}{W}（在你的维持开始时，若你在你前一个维持开始后才操控它，则除非你支付其返响费用，否则牺牲之。）
当宿命导士进战场时，将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

foreignNames.name: 宿命導士
foreignNames.text:
飛行，反黑保護
返響{3}{W}{W}（在你的維持開始時，若你在你前一個維持開始後才操控它，則除非你支付其返響費用，否則犧牲之。）
當宿命導士進戰場時，將目標生物牌從你的墳墓場移回戰場。

originalText:
Flying, protection from black
Echo {3}{W}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Karmic Guide enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Seal of Cleansing
text: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor:
"I am the purifier, the light that clears all shadows."
—Seal inscription

rulings.text: Sacrificing Seal of Cleansing is the cost to activate its ability. Once you activate the ability, no player can do anything to Seal of Cleansing to stop you from activating it. Notably, if you cast Seal of Cleansing during your turn, you'll have priority to activate its ability before anyone can respond to stop you.

foreignNames.name: Siegel der Reinheit
foreignNames.text: Opfere das Siegel der Reinheit: Zerstöre ein Artefakt oder eine Verzauberung deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Ich bin das Licht, das alle Schatten vertreibt."
—Siegelinschrift

foreignNames.name: Sello de limpieza
foreignNames.text: Sacrificar el Sello de limpieza: Destruye el artefacto o encantamiento objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Yo soy el purificador, la luz que desaparece todas las sombras".
—Inscripción del Sello

foreignNames.name: Sceau de nettoiement
foreignNames.text: Sacrifiez le Sceau de nettoiement : Détruisez un artefact ciblé ou un enchantement ciblé.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Je suis le purificateur, la lumière qui efface toutes les ombres. »
—Inscription du sceau

foreignNames.name: Sigillo della Purezza
foreignNames.text: Sacrifica il Sigillo della Purezza: Distruggi un artefatto o un incantesimo bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Sono il purificatore, la luce che spazza via le tenebre."
—Iscrizione del Sigillo

foreignNames.name: 浄化の印章
foreignNames.text: 浄化の印章を生け贄に捧げる：アーティファクト１つかエンチャント１つを対象とする。それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor:
「我は浄化するものなり。すべての影を一掃する光なり。」
――印章に刻まれた言葉

foreignNames.name: 정화의 봉인
foreignNames.text: 정화의 봉인을 희생한다: 마법물체 또는 부여마법을 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 파괴한다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"나는 정화하는 자요, 모든 그림자를 밝게 하는 빛이라."
—봉인에 새겨진 글

foreignNames.name: Selo da Purificação
foreignNames.text: Sacrifique Selo da Purificação: Destrua o artefato ou encantamento alvo.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Sou a purificadora, a luz que expurga toda sombra."
— Inscrição no selo

foreignNames.name: Печать Очищения
foreignNames.text: Пожертвуйте Печать Очищения: уничтожьте целевой артефакт или чары.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Я — очищающая, свет, который прогонит тени».
— надпись на печати

foreignNames.name: 净化之缄印
foreignNames.text: 牺牲净化之缄印：消灭目标神器或结界。
foreignNames.flavor:
「吾乃净化之源，是为驱离所有暗影之明光。」
～缄印铭文

foreignNames.name: 淨化之緘印
foreignNames.text: 犧牲淨化之緘印：消滅目標神器或結界。
foreignNames.flavor:
「吾乃淨化之源，是為驅離所有闇影之明光。」
～緘印銘文

originalText: Sacrifice Seal of Cleansing: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

name: Solitary Confinement
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Solitary Confinement unless you discard a card.
Skip your draw step.
You have shroud. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

rulings.text: The draw step happens after the upkeep step. If you choose not to pay Solitary Confinement's upkeep cost, you'll sacrifice it. That turn's draw step will happen.
Solitary Confinement prevents all damage that would be dealt to you, not just combat damage.

foreignNames.name: Einzelzelle
foreignNames.text:
Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments opferst du die Einzelzelle, es sei denn, du wirfst eine Karte ab.
Übergehe dein Ziehsegment.
Du hast Verhülltheit. (Du kannst nicht das Ziel von Zaubersprüchen oder Fähigkeiten sein.)
Verhindere allen Schaden, der dir zugefügt würde.

foreignNames.name: Incomunicación
foreignNames.text:
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, sacrifica la Incomunicación a menos que descartes una carta.
Sáltate tu paso de robar.
Tienes la habilidad de velo. (No puedes ser objetivo de hechizos o habilidades.)
Prevén todo el daño que se te fuera a hacer.

foreignNames.name: Mitard
foreignNames.text:
Au début de votre entretien, sacrifiez le Mitard à moins que vous ne vous défaussiez d'une carte.
Passez votre étape de pioche.
Vous avez le linceul. (Vous ne pouvez pas être la cible de sorts ou de capacités.)
Prévenez toutes les blessures qui devraient vous être infligées.

foreignNames.name: Isolamento
foreignNames.text:
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, sacrifica l'Isolamento a meno che non scarti una carta.
Salta la tua acquisizione.
Hai velo. (Non puoi essere bersaglio di magie o abilità.)
Previeni tutto il danno che ti verrebbe inflitto.

foreignNames.name: 独房監禁
foreignNames.text:
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたがカード１枚を捨てないかぎり、独房監禁を生け贄に捧げる。
あなたのドロー・ステップを飛ばす。
あなたは被覆を持つ。（あなたは呪文や能力の対象にならない。）
あなたが受けるすべてのダメージを軽減する。

foreignNames.name: 독방 감금
foreignNames.text:
당신의 유지단 시작에, 당신이 카드 한 장을 버리지 않는 한 독방 감금을 희생한다.
당신의 뽑기단을 건너뛴다.
당신은 은신을 가진다. (당신은 주문 또는 능력의 목표로 정해질 수 없다.)
당신에게 입혀지려는 모든 피해를 방지한다.

foreignNames.name: Confinamento Solitário
foreignNames.text:
No início de sua manutenção, sacrifique Confinamento Solitário, a menos que você descarte um card.
Pule sua etapa de compra.
Você tem manto. (Você não pode ser alvo de mágicas nem de habilidades.)
Previna todo dano que seria causado a você.

foreignNames.name: Одиночное Заключение
foreignNames.text:
В начале вашего шага поддержки пожертвуйте Одиночное Заключение, если только вы не сбросите карту.
Пропустите ваш шаг взятия карты.
Вы имеете Пелену. (Вы не можете быть целью заклинаний или способностей.)
Предотвратите все повреждения, которые должны быть вам нанесены.

foreignNames.name: 单独拘禁
foreignNames.text:
在你的维持开始时，除非你弃一张牌，否则牺牲单独拘禁。
略过你的抓牌步骤。
你具有帷幕异能。（你不能成为咒语或异能的目标。）
防止将对你造成的所有伤害。

foreignNames.name: 單獨拘禁
foreignNames.text:
在你的維持開始時，除非你棄一張牌，否則犧牲單獨拘禁。
略過你的抽牌步驟。
你具有帷幕異能。（你不能成為咒語或異能的目標。）
防止將對你造成的所有傷害。

originalText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Solitary Confinement unless you discard a card.
Skip your draw step.
You have shroud. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

name: Soul Snare
text: {W}, Sacrifice Soul Snare: Exile target creature that's attacking you or a planeswalker you control.
flavor:
"Shackle the body, and the anguish lasts only until death. Shackle the soul, and the wicked can be punished for eternity."
—Inquisitor Laerin

rulings.text: Sacrificing Soul Snare is part of the cost to activate the ability. Once you activate the ability, no player can do anything to Soul Snare to stop you from activating it.

If Soul Snare's ability targets a creature that's attacking a planeswalker you control, but that planeswalker is no longer on the battlefield as the ability tries to resolve, the attacking creature will be an illegal target and Soul Snare's ability won't exile that creature.

foreignNames.name: Seelenschlinge
foreignNames.text: {W}, opfere die Seelenschlinge: Schicke eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die dich oder einen Planeswalker, den du kontrollierst, angreift, ins Exil.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Fessle den Körper, und die Qual dauert nur bis zum Tod. Fessle die Seele, und die Strafe dauert ewig."
—Inquisitorin Laerin

foreignNames.name: Trampa de almas
foreignNames.text: {W}, sacrificar la Trampa de almas: Exilia la criatura objetivo que está atacándote a ti o a un planeswalker que controlas.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Los pérfidos solo sufrirán hasta la muerte si aprisionas sus cuerpos. Pero, si aprisionas sus almas, serán castigados para toda la eternidad".
—Inquisidora Laerin

foreignNames.name: Collet spirituel
foreignNames.text: {W}, sacrifiez le Collet spirituel : Exilez une créature ciblée qui vous attaque ou qui attaque un planeswalker que vous contrôlez.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Enchaînez le corps, et l'angoisse s'évanouira avec la mort. Enchaînez l'âme, et les impurs peuvent être punis pour l'éternité. »
—Inquisiteur Laërin

foreignNames.name: Intrappolare Anima
foreignNames.text: {W}, Sacrifica Intrappolare Anima: Esilia una creatura bersaglio che sta attaccando te o un planeswalker che controlli.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Incatena il corpo, e il tormento termina con la morte. Incatena l'anima, e punirai i malvagi per l'eternità."
—Inquisitrice Laerin

foreignNames.name: 魂の捕獲
foreignNames.text: {W}, 魂の捕獲を生け贄に捧げる：あなたやあなたがコントロールしているプレインズウォーカーを攻撃しているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。それを追放する。
foreignNames.flavor:
「体を縛れば、その苦悶は死ぬまでしか続かない。魂を縛れば、悪を永遠に罰することができる。」
――審問官レイリン

foreignNames.name: 영혼 덫
foreignNames.text: {W}, 영혼 덫을 희생한다: 당신 또는 당신이 조종하는 플레인즈워커를 공격하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 추방한다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"육체를 구속하면, 고통은 죽을 때까지만 유지되지. 영혼을 구속하면, 사악한 자를 영원히 벌할 수 있다."
—심문관 레이린

foreignNames.name: Armadilha para Almas
foreignNames.text: {W}, sacrifique Armadilha para Almas: Exile a criatura alvo que está atacando você ou um planeswalker que você controla.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Acorrente o corpo, e o tormento dura apenas até a morte. Acorrente a alma, e os perversos serão punidos por toda a eternidade."
— Inquisidora Laerin

foreignNames.name: Силки Души
foreignNames.text: {W}, пожертвуйте Силки Души: изгоните целевое существо, атакующее вас или planeswalker'а под вашим контролем.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Надень оковы на тело, и мучения продлятся всего лишь до смерти. Надень оковы на душу, и нечестивый будет наказан на целую вечность».
— инквизитор Лейрин

foreignNames.name: 灵魂圈套
foreignNames.text: {W}，牺牲灵魂圈套：放逐目标正向你或由你操控之鹏洛客进行攻击的生物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「禁锢肉身，痛苦至死便消。禁锢灵魂，方能永世惩恶。」
～审判官蕾琳

foreignNames.name: 靈魂圈套
foreignNames.text: {W}，犧牲靈魂圈套：放逐目標正向你或由你操控之鵬洛客進行攻擊的生物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「禁錮肉身，痛苦至死便消。禁錮靈魂，方能永世懲惡。」
～審判官蕾琳

originalText: {W}, Sacrifice Soul Snare: Exile target creature that's attacking you or a planeswalker you control.

name: Counterspell
text: Counter target spell.

foreignNames.name: Gegenzauber
foreignNames.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl.

foreignNames.name: Contrahechizo
foreignNames.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo.

foreignNames.name: Contresort
foreignNames.text: Contrecarrez un sort ciblé.

foreignNames.name: Contromagia
foreignNames.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio.

foreignNames.name: 対抗呪文
foreignNames.text: 呪文１つを対象とする。それを打ち消す。

foreignNames.name: 주문 무효화
foreignNames.text: 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다.

foreignNames.name: Contramágica
foreignNames.text: Anule a mágica alvo.

foreignNames.name: Отмена Заклинания
foreignNames.text: Отмените целевое заклинание.

foreignNames.name: 反击咒语
foreignNames.text: 反击目标咒语。

foreignNames.name: 反擊咒語
foreignNames.text: 反擊目標咒語。

originalText: Counter target spell.

name: Sea Drake
text:
Flying
When Sea Drake enters the battlefield, return two target lands you control to their owner's hand.
flavor: Highly territorial, they often attack boats whose colors too closely resemble those of other drakes.

rulings.text: Although you must choose two lands you control as the targets of Sea Drake's triggered ability, there is no consequence to Sea Drake if the ability doesn't resolve. If one of the lands becomes an illegal target in response, the remaining legal target will be returned to its owner's hand. If both targets have become illegal in response, nothing happens.

If you can't target two lands you control with the triggered ability (perhaps because you control fewer than two lands), the ability will be removed from the stack. You won't return any lands. There is no consequence for this.

foreignNames.name: Meeressceada
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Meeressceada ins Spiel kommt, bringe zwei Länder deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Um ihr Gebiet zu verteidigen, greifen sie oft Boote an, deren Farben zu sehr denen anderer Sceadas ähneln.

foreignNames.name: Draco del mar
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Cuando el Draco del mar entre al campo de batalla, regresa dos tierras objetivo que controlas a la mano de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Son muy territoriales y suelen atacar a los barcos que tengan colores parecidos a los de otros dracos.

foreignNames.name: Drakôn marin
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Quand le Drakôn marin arrive sur le champ de bataille, renvoyez deux terrains ciblés que vous contrôlez dans la main de leur propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: Excessivement territoriaux, ils attaquent souvent les bateaux qui ont des couleurs similaires à celles des autres drakôns.

foreignNames.name: Draghetto Marino
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Quando il Draghetto Marino entra nel campo di battaglia, fai tornare due terre bersaglio che controlli in mano ai rispettivi proprietari.
foreignNames.flavor: Estremamente territoriali, spesso attaccano le barche i cui colori ricordano quelli di altri draghetti.

foreignNames.name: 海のドレイク
foreignNames.text:
飛行
海のドレイクが戦場に出たとき、あなたがコントロールしている土地２つを対象とする。それらをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ドレイク
foreignNames.flavor: 縄張り意識がとても強く、ドレイクに似た色の船はよく襲われる。

foreignNames.name: 바다 드레이크
foreignNames.text:
비행
바다 드레이크가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 조종하는 대지 두 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 대지들을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 드레이크들은 극도로 자기 영역을 지키며, 종종 다른 드레이크들과 지나치게 비슷한 색을 가진 보트들을 공격하곤 한다.

foreignNames.name: Dragonete Marinho
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Quando Dragonete Marinho entrar no campo de batalha, devolva dois terrenos alvo que você controla para a mão de seus donos.
foreignNames.flavor: Altamente territoriais, eles frequentemente atacam barcos cujas cores lembrem as de outros dragonetes.

foreignNames.name: Морской Дрейк
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Когда Морской Дрейк выходит на поле битвы, верните две целевые земли под вашим контролем в руки их владельцев.
foreignNames.flavor: Дрейки яростно защищают свою территорию и нередко нападают на корабли, если цвет парусов напоминает им об их сородичах.

foreignNames.name: 海龙兽
foreignNames.text:
飞行
当海龙兽进战场时，将两个目标由你操控的地移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 它们有着强烈的领地意识，经常会攻击颜色近似其他龙兽的船只。

foreignNames.name: 海龍獸
foreignNames.text:
飛行
當海龍獸進戰場時，將兩個目標由你操控的地移回其擁有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 牠們有著強烈的領地意識，經常會攻擊顏色近似其他龍獸的船隻。

originalText:
Flying
When Sea Drake enters the battlefield, return two target lands you control to their owner's hand.

name: Seal of Removal
text: Sacrifice Seal of Removal: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"I am the unraveler, the loosened thread that will not hold."
—Seal inscription

rulings.text: Sacrificing Seal of Removal is the cost to activate its ability. Once you activate the ability, no player can do anything to Seal of Removal to stop you from activating it. Notably, if you cast Seal of Removal during your turn, you'll have priority to activate its ability before anyone can respond to stop you.

foreignNames.name: Siegel der Erlösung
foreignNames.text: Opfere das Siegel der Erlösung: Bringe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Ich bin der, der alles auflöst, der gelockerte Faden, der nicht halten wird."
—Siegelinschrift

foreignNames.name: Sello de remoción
foreignNames.text: Sacrificar el Sello de remoción: Regresa la criatura objetivo a la mano de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Yo soy el deshilador, el hilo suelto que no soportará".
—Inscripción del Sello

foreignNames.name: Sceau d'enlèvement
foreignNames.text: Sacrifiez le Sceau d'enlèvement : Renvoyez une créature ciblée dans la main de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Je suis le fugitif, la corde qui jamais ne s'attache. »
—Inscription du sceau

foreignNames.name: Sigillo della Rimozione
foreignNames.text: Sacrifica il Sigillo della Rimozione: Fai tornare una creatura bersaglio in mano al suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Sono il districatore, il filo allentato che non terrà."
—Iscrizione del Sigillo

foreignNames.name: 退去の印章
foreignNames.text: 退去の印章を生け贄に捧げる：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor:
「我はもつれをほどくものなり。何も結べぬほどけた糸なり。」
――印章に刻まれた言葉

foreignNames.name: 제거의 봉인
foreignNames.text: 제거의 봉인을 희생한다: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"나는 묶인 것을 푸는 자요, 붙잡을 수 없게 풀어헤쳐진 끈이라."
—봉인에 새겨진 글

foreignNames.name: Selo da Remoção
foreignNames.text: Sacrifique Selo da Remoção: Devolva a criatura alvo para a mão de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Sou o desatador, o fio solto que não segura."
— Inscrição no selo

foreignNames.name: Печать Устранения
foreignNames.text: Пожертвуйте Печать Устранения: верните целевое существо в руку его владельца.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Я — расплетающая, слабая нить, что не удержит».
— надпись на печати

foreignNames.name: 移除之缄印
foreignNames.text: 牺牲移除之缄印：将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor:
「吾乃解结者，是为无法缠持之松绳。」
～缄印铭文

foreignNames.name: 移除之緘印
foreignNames.text: 犧牲移除之緘印：將目標生物移回其擁有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor:
「吾乃解結者，是為無法纏持之松繩。」
～緘印銘文

originalText: Sacrifice Seal of Removal: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

name: Upheaval
text: Return all permanents to their owners' hands.
flavor: The calm comes after the storm.

foreignNames.name: Umwälzung
foreignNames.text: Bringe alle bleibenden Karten auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Ruhe kommt immer erst nach dem Sturm.

foreignNames.name: Alzamiento
foreignNames.text: Regresa todos los permanentes a las manos de sus propietarios.
foreignNames.flavor: La calma llega después de la tormenta.

foreignNames.name: Bouleversement
foreignNames.text: Renvoyez tous les permanents dans les mains de leurs propriétaires.
foreignNames.flavor: Après la tempête viennent le calme et le beau temps.

foreignNames.name: Sconvolgimento
foreignNames.text: Fai tornare tutti i permanenti in mano ai rispettivi proprietari.
foreignNames.flavor: La calma viene dopo la tempesta.

foreignNames.name: 激動
foreignNames.text: すべてのパーマネントをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: 嵐のあとには静けさがある。

foreignNames.name: 격변
foreignNames.text: 모든 지속물들을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 폭풍 뒤에는 고요가 찾아온다.

foreignNames.name: Sublevação
foreignNames.text: Devolva todas as permanentes para as mãos de seus donos.
foreignNames.flavor: A calmaria vem depois da tempestade.

foreignNames.name: Смещение Пластов
foreignNames.text: Верните все перманенты в руки их владельцев.
foreignNames.flavor: Затишье наступает после бури.

foreignNames.name: 动荡
foreignNames.text: 将所有永久物移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 暴风后终归宁静。

foreignNames.name: 動盪
foreignNames.text: 將所有永久物移回其擁有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 暴風後終歸寧靜。

originalText: Return all permanents to their owners' hands.

name: Wonder
text:
Flying
As long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an Island, creatures you control have flying.
flavor:
"It fell silently from the sky and broke the surface without a ripple. Was it even here at all?"
—Fisherman's journal

foreignNames.name: Das Wunder
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Solange das Wunder in deinem Friedhof ist und du eine Insel kontrollierst, haben Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, Flugfähigkeit.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Es fiel lautlos vom Himmel und durchbrach die Oberfläche, ohne das Wasser zu bewegen. War es überhaupt hier?"
—Tagebuch eines Fischers

foreignNames.name: Maravilla
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Mientras la Maravilla esté en tu cementerio y controles una Isla, las criaturas que controlas tienen la habilidad de volar.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Atravesó la superficie cuando cayó del cielo sin hacer ruido y sin crear ni una onda. ¿De verdad estuvo aquí?".
—Diario del pescador

foreignNames.name: L'Émerveillement
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Tant que L'Émerveillement est dans votre cimetière et que vous contrôlez une île, les créatures que vous contrôlez ont le vol.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Il tomba du ciel en silence et perça la surface sans créer une ride. Était-il seulement vraiment là ? »
—Journal du pêcheur

foreignNames.name: La Meraviglia
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Fintanto che La Meraviglia è nel tuo cimitero e controlli un'Isola, le creature che controlli hanno volare.
foreignNames.flavor:
"È caduta silenziosamente dal cielo e si è inabissata senza un'increspatura. Che fosse una visione?"
—Diario di un pescatore

foreignNames.name: 不可思議
foreignNames.text:
飛行
不可思議があなたの墓地にあってあなたが島をコントロールしているかぎり、あなたがコントロールしているすべてのクリーチャーは飛行を持つ。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — インカーネーション
foreignNames.flavor:
「音もなく空から落ちてきて、波一つ立てずに水面を破った。本当にここで起きたことなのだろうか？」
――漁師の日記

foreignNames.name: 불가사의
foreignNames.text:
비행
불가사의가 당신의 무덤에 있고 당신이 섬을 조종하는 한, 당신이 조종하는 생물들은 비행을 가진다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"그것은 조용히 하늘에서 내려와 모습을 드러냈지만, 물결이 전혀 일지 않았어. 여기에 있긴 했던 걸까?"
—낚시꾼의 일지

foreignNames.name: Maravilha
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Enquanto Maravilha estiver em seu cemitério e você controlar uma Ilha, as criaturas que você controla terão voar.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Despencou do céu silenciosamente e rompeu a superfície sem causar nenhuma ondulação. Estava realmente ali ou era uma visão?"
— Diário de pescador

foreignNames.name: Удивление
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Пока Удивление находится на вашем кладбище и вы контролируете Остров, существа под вашим контролем имеют Полет.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Она без звука упала с неба и ушла под воду, не потревожив поверхность. Или это мне привиделось?»
— дневник рыбака

foreignNames.name: 神奇
foreignNames.text:
飞行
只要神奇在你的坟墓场且你操控海岛，由你操控的生物便具有飞行异能。
foreignNames.flavor:
「它悄然从天而降，撞破水面却不起涟漪。它真的出现过吗？」
～渔夫日志

foreignNames.name: 神奇
foreignNames.text:
飛行
只要神奇在你的墳墓場且你操控海島，由你操控的生物便具有飛行異能。
foreignNames.flavor:
「它悄然從天而降，撞破水面卻不起漣漪。它真的出現過嗎？」
～漁夫日誌

originalText:
Flying
As long as Wonder is in your graveyard and you control an Island, creatures you control have flying.

name: Bone Shredder
text:
Flying
Echo {2}{B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Bone Shredder enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.

rulings.text: Paying for echo is always optional. When the echo triggered ability resolves, if you can't pay the echo cost or choose not to, you sacrifice that permanent.

Your permanent's echo ability will trigger at the beginning of your upkeep if it entered the battlefield since the beginning of your last upkeep, or if you gained control of it since the beginning of your last upkeep.

foreignNames.name: Knochenschleifer
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Echo {2}{B} (Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments und falls diese bleibende Karte seit Beginn deines letzten Versorgungssegments unter deine Kontrolle gekommen ist, opfere sie, es sei denn, du bezahlst ihre Echokosten.)
Wenn der Knochenschleifer ins Spiel kommt, zerstöre eine nichtschwarze Nichtartefaktkreatur deiner Wahl.

foreignNames.name: Triturahuesos
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Eco {2}{B}. (Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, si esto entró bajo tu control desde el comienzo de tu último mantenimiento, sacrifícala a menos que pagues su coste de eco.)
Cuando el Triturahuesos entre al campo de batalla, destruye la criatura objetivo que no sea negra o artefacto.

foreignNames.name: Broyeur d'os
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Écho {2}{B} (Au début de votre entretien, si ce permanent est passé sous votre contrôle depuis le début de votre dernier entretien, sacrifiez-le à moins que vous ne payiez son coût d'écho.)
Quand le Broyeur d'os arrive sur le champ de bataille, détruisez une créature non-artefact, non-noire ciblée.

foreignNames.name: Tritaossa
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Eco {2}{B} (All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, se questo permanente è entrato sotto il tuo controllo dall'inizio del tuo ultimo mantenimento, sacrificalo a meno che non paghi il suo costo di eco.)
Quando il Tritaossa entra nel campo di battaglia, distruggi una creatura non artefatto, non nera bersaglio.

foreignNames.name: 骨砕き
foreignNames.text:
飛行
エコー{2}{B}（あなたのアップキープの開始時に、これが直前のあなたのアップキープの開始時よりも後にあなたのコントロール下になっていた場合、あなたがエコー・コストを支払わないかぎり、これを生け贄に捧げる。）
骨砕きが戦場に出たとき、アーティファクトでも黒でもないクリーチャー１体を対象とする。それを破壊する。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ファイレクシアン・ミニオン

foreignNames.name: 뼈 파쇄자
foreignNames.text:
비행
에코 {2}{B} (당신의 유지단 시작에, 이 생물이 당신의 지난 유지단 시작 이후로 당신의 조종하에 놓였다면, 당신이 이 생물의 에코 비용을 지불하지 앟는 한 이 생물을 희생한다.)
뼈 파쇄자가 전장에 들어올 때, 마법물체가 아니고 흑색이 아닌 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.

foreignNames.name: Triturador de Ossos
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Eco {2}{B} (No início de sua manutenção, se este passou a estar sob seu controle desde o início de sua última manutenção, sacrifique-o, a menos que você pague seu custo de eco.)
Quando Triturador de Ossos entrar no campo de batalha, destrua a criatura alvo não preta e não artefato.

foreignNames.name: Измельчитель Костей
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Эхо {2}{B} (В начале вашего шага поддержки, если этот объект попал под ваш контроль с момента начала вашего предыдущего шага поддержки, пожертвуйте его, если вы не заплатите его стоимость Эха.)
Когда Измельчитель Костей выходит на поле битвы, уничтожьте целевое не являющееся артефактом нечерное существо.

foreignNames.name: 碎骨者
foreignNames.text:
飞行
返响{2}{B}（在你的维持开始时，若你在你前一个维持开始后才操控它，则除非你支付其返响费用，否则牺牲之。）
当碎骨者进战场时，消灭目标非神器且非黑色的生物。

foreignNames.name: 碎骨者
foreignNames.text:
飛行
返響{2}{B}（在你的維持開始時，若你在你前一個維持開始後才操控它，則除非你支付其返響費用，否則犧牲之。）
當碎骨者進戰場時，消滅目標非神器且非黑色的生物。

originalText:
Flying
Echo {2}{B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Bone Shredder enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.

name: Braids, Cabal Minion
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices an artifact, creature, or land.
flavor: "Home is where you can find a decent graveyard and strangers can disappear without awkward questions."

rulings.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, triggered abilities you control will resolve after triggered abilities your opponents control. If an opponent controls Braids and you control a triggered ability that puts a permanent onto the battlefield, you won't be able to sacrifice that permanent to satisfy Braids's ability.

foreignNames.name: Braids, die Kabbalistin
foreignNames.text: Zu Beginn des Versorgungssegments jedes Spielers opfert der Spieler ein Artefakt, eine Kreatur oder ein Land.
foreignNames.flavor: „Zu Hause ist da, wo du einen anständigen Friedhof findest und Fremde verschwinden können, ohne dass jemand unangenehme Fragen stellt."

foreignNames.name: Trenzas, sicaria de la Cábala
foreignNames.text: Al comienzo del mantenimiento de cada jugador, ese jugador sacrifica un artefacto, una criatura o una tierra.
foreignNames.flavor: "El hogar es donde puedes encontrar un cementerio decente y los desconocidos pueden desaparecer sin que haya preguntas incómodas".

foreignNames.name: Nattes, séide de la Coterie
foreignNames.text: Au début de l'entretien de chaque joueur, ce joueur sacrifie un artefact, une créature ou un terrain.
foreignNames.flavor: « Je suis chez moi partout où je peux trouver un cimetière décent, et où l'on ne pose pas de questions lorsque des étrangers disparaissent. »

foreignNames.name: Braids, Servitore della Cabala
foreignNames.text: All'inizio del mantenimento di ogni giocatore, quel giocatore sacrifica un artefatto, una creatura o una terra.
foreignNames.flavor: "La mia casa è dove c'è un cimitero decente e dove gli stranieri possono sparire senza che nessuno faccia domande indiscrete."

foreignNames.name: 陰謀団の先手ブレイズ
foreignNames.text: 各プレイヤーのアップキープの開始時に、そのプレイヤーはアーティファクト１つかクリーチャー１体か土地１つを生け贄に捧げる。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・ミニオン
foreignNames.flavor: 「我が家とは気持ちのいい墓場のある所、よそ者が姿を消しても面倒なことを聞かれずに済む所よ。」

foreignNames.name: 도당의 하수인, 브레이즈
foreignNames.text: 각 플레이어의 유지단 시작에, 그 플레이어는 마법물체, 생물 또는 대지 한 개를 희생한다.
foreignNames.flavor: "괜찮은 묘지가 있고 낯선 사람들은 어색한 질문 없이 사라질 수 있는 곳이 바로 고향이지."

foreignNames.name: Braids, Assecla da Cabala
foreignNames.text: No início da manutenção de cada jogador, aquele jogador sacrifica um artefato, uma criatura ou um terreno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Lar é o lugar onde há um cemitério decente e os estranhos podem desaparecer sem suscitar perguntas inconvenientes."

foreignNames.name: Брейдс, Приспешница Кабала
foreignNames.text: В начале шага поддержки каждого игрока тот игрок жертвует артефакт, существо или землю.
foreignNames.flavor: «Дом — это место, где под боком есть приличное кладбище, а исчезновение незнакомцев ни у кого не вызывает неудобных вопросов».

foreignNames.name: 柯帮干部布蕾德
foreignNames.text: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手牺牲一个神器，生物或地。
foreignNames.flavor: 「家园，是指可以找到像样的墓场，且陌生人无故消失也不会有人问东问西的地方。」

foreignNames.name: 柯幫幹部布蕾德
foreignNames.text: 在每位玩家的維持開始時，該玩家犧牲一個神器，生物或地。
foreignNames.flavor: 「家園，是指可以找到像樣的墓場，且陌生人無故消失也不會有人問東問西的地方。」

originalText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices an artifact, creature, or land.

name: Greed
text: {B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.
flavor: What is a sliver of one's soul compared to unimaginable wealth?

foreignNames.name: Habgier
foreignNames.text: {B}, bezahle 2 Lebenspunkte: Ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: Was ist schon ein Splitter der eigenen Seele, verglichen mit unvorstellbarem Reichtum?

foreignNames.name: Avaricia
foreignNames.text: {B}, pagar 2 vidas: Roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: ¿Qué es un fragmento de tu propia alma si lo comparas con riquezas inimaginables?

foreignNames.name: Avidité
foreignNames.text: {B}, payez 2 points de vie : Piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Que vaut une partie de votre âme comparée à une fortune inimaginable ?

foreignNames.name: Cupidigia
foreignNames.text: {B}, Paga 2 punti vita: Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Cos'è il frammento di un'anima paragonato a una ricchezza inimmaginabile?

foreignNames.name: 強欲
foreignNames.text: {B}, ２点のライフを支払う：カード１枚を引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 想像を超える富に比べれば、魂の小片など何の価値があろうか？

foreignNames.name: 탐욕
foreignNames.text: {B}, 생명 2점을 지불한다: 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 상상할 수 없는 부와 비교해 보면 영혼의 한 조각은 과연 무엇인가?

foreignNames.name: Cobiça
foreignNames.text: {B}, pague 2 pontos de vida: Compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: O que é uma fração da alma comparada a riquezas inimagináveis?

foreignNames.name: Жадность
foreignNames.text: {B}, заплатите 2 жизни: возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Что значит осколок чьей-то души по сравнению с невообразимым богатством?

foreignNames.name: 贪婪
foreignNames.text: {B}，支付2点生命：抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 与超乎想象的巨额财富相比，微乎其微的高贵心灵又值几何？

foreignNames.name: 貪婪
foreignNames.text: {B}，支付2點生命：抽一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 與超乎想像的巨額財富相比，微乎其微的高貴心靈又值幾何？

originalText: {B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.

name: Patriarch's Bidding
text: Each player chooses a creature type. Each player returns all creature cards of a type chosen this way from their graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor:
"There's some new darkness in the air tonight. If I were you, I'd stay home and lock the doors."
—Ferrick, village warden

rulings.text: The player whose turn it is chooses a creature type first, followed by each other player in turn order. Then, all creature cards that have one or more of the chosen types are returned to the battlefield at the same time.
Any player may choose a creature type that's already been chosen. Doing so won't affect which creature cards are returned to the battlefield.
Each player may choose any creature type, even if they don't have any creature cards of that type in their graveyard.
You must choose a creature type, such as Elf or Shaman. You can't choose other card types such as artifact or supertypes such as legendary.

foreignNames.name: Gebot des Patriarchen
foreignNames.text: Jeder Spieler bestimmt einen Kreaturentyp. Jeder Spieler bringt alle Kreaturenkarten, die mindestens einen der auf diese Weise bestimmten Kreaturentypen haben, aus seinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Heute Nacht liegt eine neue Dunkelheit in der Luft. Wenn ich du wäre, würde ich zu Hause bleiben und die Türen verriegeln."
—Ferrick der Dorfvorsteher

foreignNames.name: Órdenes del Patriarca
foreignNames.text: Cada jugador elige un tipo de criatura. Cada jugador regresa todas las cartas de criatura de un tipo elegido de esta manera de su cementerio al campo de batalla.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Esta noche noto una nueva oscuridad en el aire. Yo que tú me quedaría en casa y cerraría bien la puerta".
—Ferrick, guarda de la aldea

foreignNames.name: Ordre du patriarche
foreignNames.text: Chaque joueur choisit un type de créature. Chaque joueur renvoie sur le champ de bataille toutes les cartes de créature du type choisi de cette manière depuis son cimetière.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Il y a quelque chose de nouveau dans les ténèbres ce soir. Si j'étais vous, je resterais chez moi et je verrouillerais les portes. »
—Ferrick, garde du village

foreignNames.name: Comando del Patriarca
foreignNames.text: Ogni giocatore sceglie un tipo di creatura. Ogni giocatore rimette sul campo di battaglia tutte le carte creatura di un tipo scelto in questo modo dal proprio cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor:
"C'è un'oscurità diversa nell'aria stanotte. Se fossi in te, mi chiuderei in casa con le porte ben serrate."
—Ferrick, custode del villaggio

foreignNames.name: 総帥の召集
foreignNames.text: 各プレイヤーはそれぞれクリーチャー・タイプ１つを選ぶ。各プレイヤーはそれぞれ、自分の墓地から、これにより選ばれたいずれかのタイプを持つすべてのクリーチャー・カードを戦場に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor:
「今夜の風には今までにない闇を感じる。私だったら扉に鍵をかけて家から出ないね。」
――村の管理人、フェリック

foreignNames.name: 대주교의 명령
foreignNames.text: 각 플레이어는 생물 유형 한 가지를 선택한다. 각 플레이어는 자신의 무덤에서 이런 식으로 선택된 유형을 가진 모든 생물을 전장으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"오늘 밤은 공기에서 새로운 어둠이 보여. 내가 너라면, 오늘은 집에서 문을 잠그고 있을 거야."
—마을 관리인, 페릭

foreignNames.name: Comando do Patriarca
foreignNames.text: Cada jogador escolhe um tipo de criatura. Cada jogador devolve todos os cards de criatura de um tipo escolhido dessa forma do próprio cemitério para o campo de batalha.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Há uma escuridão nova no ar essa noite. Se eu fosse você, ficaria em casa e trancaria a porta."
— Ferrick, vigia da vila

foreignNames.name: Воля Патриарха
foreignNames.text: Каждый игрок выбирает тип существа. Каждый игрок возвращает все карты существ с типом, выбранным таким образом, из своего кладбища на поле битвы.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Сегодня ночью в воздухе стоит какая-то особая тьма. На вашем месте я бы не выходил из домов и запер двери покрепче».
— Феррик, деревенский сторож

foreignNames.name: 教父邀令
foreignNames.text: 每位牌手各选择一种生物类别。每位牌手各将所有为以此法选择之类别的生物牌从其坟墓场移回战场。
foreignNames.flavor:
「今晚空中又新添几分晦气。换作我的话，就会留在家里，锁紧房门。」
～村庄护卫费利克

foreignNames.name: 教父邀令
foreignNames.text: 每位玩家各選擇一種生物類別。每位玩家各將所有為以此法選擇之類別的生物牌從其墳墓場移回戰場。
foreignNames.flavor:
「今晚空中又新添幾分晦氣。換作我的話，就會留在家裡，鎖緊房門。」
～村莊護衛費利克

originalText: Each player chooses a creature type. Each player returns all creature cards of a type chosen this way from their graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Skirge Familiar
text:
Flying
Discard a card: Add {B}.
flavor:
"The skirges screech along with the bone saw. It makes a terrible racket, but they seem to enjoy it."
—Keskit, the Flesh Sculptor

rulings.text: Skirge Familiar's activated ability is a mana ability. It doesn't use the stack and can't be responded to.

foreignNames.name: Vertrauter Skirg
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Wirf eine Karte ab: Erzeuge {B}.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Die Skirgs kreischen im Einklang mit der Knochensäge. Es macht einen schrecklichen Lärm, aber sie scheinen es zu genießen."
—Keskit der Fleischbildner

foreignNames.name: Familiar esquirge
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Descartar una carta: Agrega {B}.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Los esquirges chillan cuando se usa la sierra de huesos. Hace un ruido horrible, pero parece que a ellos les gusta".
—Keskit, el escultor de carne

foreignNames.name: Scrige familier
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Défaussez-vous d'une carte : Ajoutez {B}.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Les scriges grincent en réponse à la scie d'os. Cela fait un raffut du diable, mais on dirait qu'ils en apprécient le son. »
—Keskit, le sculpteur de chair

foreignNames.name: Skirge Famiglio
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Scarta una carta: Aggiungi {B}.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Gli skirge gridano insieme alla sega per ossa. Fanno un baccano terribile, ma sembrano divertiti."
—Keskit, lo Scultore di Carne

foreignNames.name: スカージの使い魔
foreignNames.text:
飛行
カード１枚を捨てる：{B}を加える。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ファイレクシアン・インプ
foreignNames.flavor:
「スカージは骨鋸と一緒に甲高い声を上げた。酷い音だがスカージは楽しんでいるようだ。」
――肉体彫刻家、ケスキット

foreignNames.name: 스커즈 소환수
foreignNames.text:
비행
카드 한 장을 버린다: {B}를 추가한다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"스커즈들은 뼈톱 소리를 따라 끽끽 소리를 지르지. 끔찍한 소음이지만, 저것들은 그걸 즐기고 있는 것처럼 보여."
—살점 조각가, 케스킷

foreignNames.name: Eskirge Familiar
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Descarte um card: Adicione {B}.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Os eskirges guincham junto com a serra óssea. É uma algazarra horrível, mas eles parecem gostar."
— Keskit, o Escultor da Carne

foreignNames.name: Скирж-Питомец
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Сбросьте карту: добавьте {B}.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Скиржи визжат, подпевая костной пиле. Шум стоит невыносимый, но им, похоже, это нравится».
— Кескит, Скульптор Плоти

foreignNames.name: 斯克魔佣兽
foreignNames.text:
飞行
弃一张牌：加{B}。
foreignNames.flavor:
「斯克魔骨头相磨作响，伴以尖啸阵阵。虽然这噪音别人难以忍受，但他们似乎乐在其中。」
～血肉雕匠刻兹杰

foreignNames.name: 斯克魔傭獸
foreignNames.text:
飛行
棄一張牌：加{B}。
foreignNames.flavor:
「斯克魔骨頭相磨作響，伴以尖嘯陣陣。雖然這噪音別人難以忍受，但他們似乎樂在其中。」
～血肉雕匠刻茲傑

originalText:
Flying
Discard a card: Add {B}.

name: Chance Encounter
text:
Whenever you win a coin flip, put a luck counter on Chance Encounter.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Chance Encounter has ten or more luck counters on it, you win the game.
flavor:
"What are the odds, indeed?"
—Yusri, to Desera

rulings.text: You can only win a coin flip if you are the player flipping the coin. Your opponent losing a flip does not count as you winning one. This is a reversal of previous rulings.

foreignNames.name: Begegnung mit dem Glück
foreignNames.text:
Immer wenn du einen Münzwurf gewinnst, lege eine Glücksmarke auf die Begegnung mit dem Glück.
Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments und falls zehn oder mehr Glücksmarken auf der Begegnung mit dem Glück liegen, gewinnst du die Partie.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Wie stehen die Chancen dafür?"
—Yusri, zu Desera

foreignNames.name: Encuentro fortuito
foreignNames.text:
Siempre que ganes un lanzamiento de moneda, pon un contador de suerte sobre el Encuentro fortuito.
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, si el Encuentro fortuito tiene diez o más contadores de suerte sobre él, ganas el juego.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Ya, ¿cómo es posible?".
—Yusri a Desera

foreignNames.name: Rencontre de hasard
foreignNames.text:
À chaque fois que vous gagnez un pile ou face, mettez un marqueur « chance » sur la Rencontre de hasard.
Au début de votre entretien, si la Rencontre de hasard a au moins dix marqueurs « chance » sur elle, vous gagnez la partie.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Vous parlez d'une coïncidence ! »
—Yusri, à Desera

foreignNames.name: Incontro Fortuito
foreignNames.text:
Ogniqualvolta vinci il lancio di una moneta, metti un segnalino fortuna sull'Incontro Fortuito.
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, se l'Incontro Fortuito ha dieci o più segnalini fortuna, vinci la partita.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Ma guarda un po' che coincidenza."
—Yusri a Desera

foreignNames.name: 偶然の出合い
foreignNames.text:
あなたがコイン投げ１回に勝つたび、偶然の出合いの上に運勢カウンター１個を置く。
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、偶然の出合いの上に運勢カウンター10個以上が置かれている場合、あなたはこのゲームに勝利する。
foreignNames.flavor:
「実際のところ勝ち目は？」
――ユスリからデセーラへ

foreignNames.name: 우연한 만남
foreignNames.text:
당신이 동전 던지기를 이길 때마다, 우연한 만남에 행운 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다.
당신의 유지단 시작에, 우연한 만남이 행운 카운터를 열 개 이상 가지고 있다면, 당신은 게임에서 승리한다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"그러게, 이게 무슨 우연이야?"
—유스리가 데세라에게

foreignNames.name: Encontro Casual
foreignNames.text:
Toda vez que você vencer um cara ou coroa, coloque um marcador de sorte em Encontro Casual.
No início de sua manutenção, se Encontro Casual tiver dez ou mais marcadores de sorte, você vence o jogo.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Qual a probabilidade, não é?"
— Yusri, para Desera

foreignNames.name: Случайная Встреча
foreignNames.text:
Каждый раз, когда вы выигрываете бросок монеты, положите один жетон удачи на Случайную Встречу.
В начале вашего шага поддержки, если на Случайной Встрече есть не менее десяти жетонов удачи, вы выигрываете партию.
foreignNames.flavor:
«И действительно, какова вероятность...»
— Юзри, обращаясь к Десере

foreignNames.name: 机缘
foreignNames.text:
每当你猜对一次掷硬币时，在机缘上放置一个运气指示物。
在你的维持开始时，若机缘上有十个或更多运气指示物，则你赢得这盘游戏。
foreignNames.flavor:
「认真说，得有多巧？」
～尤司理致德塞拉

foreignNames.name: 機緣
foreignNames.text:
每當你猜對一次擲硬幣時，在機緣上放置一個運氣指示物。
在你的維持開始時，若機緣上有十個或更多運氣指示物，則你贏得這盤遊戲。
foreignNames.flavor:
「認真說，得有多巧？」
～尤斯理問德塞拉

originalText:
Whenever you win a coin flip, put a luck counter on Chance Encounter.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Chance Encounter has ten or more luck counters on it, you win the game.

name: Flame Rift
text: Flame Rift deals 4 damage to each player.
flavor:
"You might want to step back."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

foreignNames.name: Flammende Öffnung
foreignNames.text: Die Flammende Öffnung fügt jedem Spieler 4 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Du solltest besser einen Schritt zurücktreten."
—Jaya Ballard, Magier für alle Fälle

foreignNames.name: Fisura llameante
foreignNames.text: La Fisura llameante hace 4 puntos de daño a cada jugador.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Es mejor que te apartes".
—Jaya Ballard, auxiliar de mago

foreignNames.name: Ride de flammes
foreignNames.text: La Ride de flammes inflige 4 blessures à chaque joueur.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Vous voudrez peut-être reculer un peu. »
—Jaya Ballard, spécimage

foreignNames.name: Squarcio di Fiamme
foreignNames.text: Lo Squarcio di Fiamme infligge 4 danni a ogni giocatore.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Ti conviene fare un passo indietro."
—Jaya Ballard, maga specialista

foreignNames.name: 火炎の裂け目
foreignNames.text: 火炎の裂け目は各プレイヤーにそれぞれ４点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor:
「後ろに下がった方がいいよ。」
――特務魔道士、ヤヤ・バラード

foreignNames.name: 화염 균열
foreignNames.text: 화염 균열은 각 플레이어에게 피해 4점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"뒤로 물러나는 게 좋을 거야."
—용병 마도사, 자야 발라드

foreignNames.name: Fenda de Chamas
foreignNames.text: Fenda de Chamas causa 4 pontos de dano a cada jogador.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Pode ser melhor se afastar."
— Jaya Ballard, maga especialista

foreignNames.name: Пламенный Разлом
foreignNames.text: Пламенный Разлом наносит 4 повреждения каждому игроку.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Лучше отойди, пожалуй».
— Джайя Баллард, маг-десятник

foreignNames.name: 天火断空
foreignNames.text: 天火断空对每位牌手各造成4点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor:
「你可能要靠后点。」
～特务巫师雅亚巴拉德

foreignNames.name: 天火斷空
foreignNames.text: 天火斷空對每位玩家各造成4點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor:
「你可能要靠後點。」
～特務巫師雅亞巴拉德

originalText: Flame Rift deals 4 damage to each player.

name: Goblin Bombardment
text: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor: With one motion, a pest is removed and a scourge inflicted.

foreignNames.name: Goblin-Bombardierung
foreignNames.text: Opfere eine Kreatur: Die Goblin-Bombardierung fügt einem Ziel deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Mit einem einzigen Handgriff wird ein Schädling entfernt und eine Plage verursacht.

foreignNames.name: Bombardeo trasgo
foreignNames.text: Sacrificar una criatura: El Bombardeo trasgo hace 1 punto de daño a cualquier objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Con solo un movimiento, desaparece una plaga y se inflige una herida.

foreignNames.name: Bombardement des gobelins
foreignNames.text: Sacrifiez une créature : Le Bombardement des gobelins inflige 1 blessure à n'importe quelle cible.
foreignNames.flavor: D'une pierre deux coups : on se débarrasse d'un parasite et on inflige un fléau.

foreignNames.name: Bombardamento dei Goblin
foreignNames.text: Sacrifica una creatura: Il Bombardamento dei Goblin infligge 1 danno a un qualsiasi bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Come liberarsi di un parassita e infliggere una piaga in una sola mossa.

foreignNames.name: ゴブリンの砲撃
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる：クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。ゴブリンの砲撃はそれに１点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 一回の動作で、邪魔者が取り除かれて災いが与えられる。

foreignNames.name: 고블린 폭격
foreignNames.text: 생물 한 개를 희생한다: 원하는 목표를 정한다. 고블린 폭격은 그 목표에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: 동작 한 번으로, 해충은 제거되고 재앙이 도래한다.

foreignNames.name: Bombardeio Goblin
foreignNames.text: Sacrifique uma criatura: Bombardeio Goblin causa 1 ponto de dano a qualquer alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: Como se liberar de uma praga e lançar uma maldição num só golpe.

foreignNames.name: Гоблинский Обстрел
foreignNames.text: Пожертвуйте существо: Гоблинский Обстрел наносит 1 повреждение любой цели.
foreignNames.flavor: Избавиться от паразита и нанести вред врагу — и все за один раз.

foreignNames.name: 鬼怪轰炸
foreignNames.text: 牺牲一个生物：鬼怪轰炸对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 只见扳机一动，消灭一只害虫，造成一场灾难。

foreignNames.name: 鬼怪轟炸
foreignNames.text: 犧牲一個生物：鬼怪轟炸對任意一個目標造成1點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 只見扳機一動，消滅一隻害蟲，造成一場災難。

originalText: Sacrifice a creature: Goblin Bombardment deals 1 damage to any target.

name: Gorilla Shaman
text: {X}{X}{1}: Destroy target noncreature artifact with mana value X.
flavor:
"Frankly, destruction is best left to professionals."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

rulings.text: A tip on how this math works: The cost to destroy a noncreature artifact with mana value 0 is {0} + {0} + {1} = {1}. The cost to destroy a noncreature artifact with mana value 1 is {1} + {1} + {1} = {3}. The cost to destroy a noncreature artifact with mana value 2 is {2} + {2} + {1} = {5}. And so on.

foreignNames.name: Gorillaschamane
foreignNames.text: {X}{X}{1}: Zerstöre ein Nichtkreatur-Artefakt deiner Wahl mit Manabetrag X.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Um ehrlich zu sein: Wenn es um Zerstörung geht, ruft man besser einen Profi."
—Jaya Ballard, Magier für alle Fälle

foreignNames.name: Gorila chamán
foreignNames.text: {X}{X}{1}: Destruye el artefacto objetivo que no sea criatura con valor de maná de X.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Lo mejor es dejar la destrucción en manos de profesionales".
—Jaya Ballard, auxiliar de mago

foreignNames.name: Shamane gorille
foreignNames.text: {X}{X}{1} : Détruisez un artefact non-créature ciblé avec une valeur de mana de X.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Franchement, laissez plutôt la destruction aux professionnels. »
—Jaya Ballard, spécimage

foreignNames.name: Sciamano dei Gorilla
foreignNames.text: {X}{X}{1}: Distruggi un artefatto non creatura bersaglio con valore di mana pari a X.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Francamente, è meglio lasciare l'opera di distruzione a dei veri professionisti."
—Jaya Ballard, maga specialista

foreignNames.name: ゴリラのシャーマン
foreignNames.text: {X}{X}{1}：マナ総量がＸでクリーチャーでないアーティファクト１つを対象とする。それを破壊する。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 類人猿・シャーマン
foreignNames.flavor:
「率直に言えば、破壊は本職に任せるのが一番ね。」
――特務魔道士、ヤヤ・バラード

foreignNames.name: 고릴라 주술사
foreignNames.text: {X}{X}{1}: 마나 값이 X이며 생물이 아닌 마법물체를 목표로 정한다. 그 마법물체를 파괴한다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"솔직히 말하자면, 파괴는 전문가들에게 맡겨두는 게 최선이지."
—용병 마도사, 자야 발라드

foreignNames.name: Xamã dos Gorilas
foreignNames.text: {X}{X}{1}: Destrua o artefato alvo não de criatura com valor de mana igual a X.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Sinceramente, é melhor deixar a destruição para os profissionais."
— Jaya Ballard, maga especialista

foreignNames.name: Горилла-Шаман
foreignNames.text: {X}{X}{1}: уничтожьте целевой не являющийся существом артефакт с мановой ценностью X.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Если честно, разрушение лучше оставить профессионалам».
— Джайя Баллард, маг-десятник

foreignNames.name: 大猩猩祭师
foreignNames.text: {X}{X}{1}：消灭目标法术力值为X的非生物神器。
foreignNames.flavor:

name: Imperial Recruiter
text: When Imperial Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with power 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: A passionate recruiter will win a war before the first arrow flies.

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.
If a creature card has “*” in its power, the ability that defines its power works in all zones.
